ART vs Dalvik / AOT vs JIT. Android apps are deployed in Dalvik bytecode,

 which is portable, unlike native code. ... Dalvik is based on JIT (just in time)

 compilation. It means that each time you run an app,

 the part of the code required for its execution is going to be translated (compiled) to machine code at that moment
